name: Flickr
description: A Driver to synchronize your photos and videos with a Flickr account. In order to use it, you need to retrieve Oauth tokens with the provided get_tokens.py script.

oauth_token.name: Oauth token
oauth_token.description: Your Oauth token retrieved with get_tokens.py

oauth_token_secret.name: Oauth token secret
oauth_token_secret.description: Your Oauth token secret retrieved with get_tokens.py

changes_timer.name: Changes timer
changes_timer.description: The amount of time you want Onitu to wait between each check for new files on your Flickr account, in seconds. Defaults to 30.
